Class IFDataManager

java.lang.Object
  com.getifinity.sdk.managers.IFDataManager

public class IFDataManager
extends java.lang.Object

The Class IFDataManager, used for authenticating user, querying and parsing data from geos.zone API

queryData

public void queryData(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                      Context context,
                      OnQueryData listener)
this method is used to query data from geos.zone API

Parameters:
params - HashMap containg name-value pairs: "lat" - GPS latitude, "lng" - GPS longitude, "distance" - radius in kilometers
context - current application context
listener - OnQueryData interface
